---
title: "Title"
subtitle: "Subtitle"
author: "Name"
date: "Date"
header-includes:
  - \usepackage{booktabs}
  - \usepackage{longtable}
  - \usepackage{pdflscape}
  - \usepackage{float}
output: 
  pdf_document:
    latex_engine: xelatex
    dev: cairo_pdf
    keep_tex: yes
    citation_package: biblatex
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 3
documentclass: bxjsarticle
classoption: "xelatex, ja=standard, english"
fig_width: 160/25.4
fig_height: 160/25.4
fig_crop: yes
fig_caption: yes
lot: yes
lof: yes
fontsize: 10pt
geometry: a4paper
link-citations: true
bibliography: 
mainfont: "Noto Serif"
sansfont: "Noto Sans"
monofont: "Source Code Pro"
CJKmainfont: "Noto Serif CJK JP"
CJKsansfont: "Noto Sans CJK JP"
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE,
                      out.width = "80%", 
                      out.height = "70%",
                      fig.align = "center", 
                      warning = FALSE, 
                      error = FALSE, 
                      autodep = TRUE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '', texi2dvi = "xetex")
options(kableExtra.latex.load_packages = FALSE, tidyverse.quiet = TRUE)
```

classoption の english を外すと，Fig. と Table は 図と表にかわります。
フォントの大きさは fontsize で変えられます。図表の目次が不要であれば，
lot（表）と lof（図）を no にしてください。目次も不要なら toc を no に
してください。bibliography にbibtexのファイルを渡せば，引用論文を簡単
に引用できます。

# Read packages

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)  # For data manipulation and graphics
library(lubridate)  # For dates and times
library(kableExtra) # For nicely formatted tables
```
